feature.label: DSP/BIOS (Target Content)
feature.description: This version of DSP/BIOS Target Content can be chosen separatly for each C/C++ project via their project settings. The DSP/BIOS IDE Client, on the other hand, is common to all projects and its version must be equal to or greater than the version of this Target Content feature.
feature.license: Released under Texas Instruments Incorporated - Technology Software Publicly Available license.
